document.topic_text: 22 Aug 2016, 13:31 HRS IST | Prime Minister Narendra Modi assures five flood-hit states of total support in rescue and relief operations PM Narendra Modi inaugurates renovated Stor Palace in Kabul through video conferencing, says 1.25 billion people of India will always be on Afghanistan's side A continued failure to address the unrest in Kashmir will further deepen the sense of alienation: Omar-led team to PM Omar-led team request PM Modi to initiate dialogue with all stakeholders in the Kashmir valley immediately Sensex opens in green on renewed buying; up 58 points J & K opposition delegation submit memorandum to PM Modi seeking "immediate" ban on pellet guns in the state Rupee slumps 16 paise against dollar Opposition delegation from J & K led by former Chief Minister Omar Abdullah call on Prime Minister Narendra Modi to discuss the situation in Kashmir CAS rules Narsingh intentionally took substance in tablet form Rio bids farewell to athletes in colourful closing
document.post: 22 Aug 2016, 13:31 HRS IST | Prime Minister Narendra Modi assures five flood-hit states of total support in rescue and relief operations PM Narendra Modi inaugurates renovated Stor Palace in Kabul through video conferencing, says 1.25 billion people of India will always be on Afghanistan's side A continued failure to address the unrest in Kashmir will further deepen the sense of alienation: Omar-led team to PM Omar-led team request PM Modi to initiate dialogue with all stakeholders in the Kashmir valley immediately Sensex opens in green on renewed buying; up 58 points J & K opposition delegation submit memorandum to PM Modi seeking "immediate" ban on pellet guns in the state Rupee slumps 16 paise against dollar Opposition delegation from J & K led by former Chief Minister Omar Abdullah call on Prime Minister Narendra Modi to discuss the situation in Kashmir CAS rules Narsingh intentionally took substance in tablet form Rio bids farewell to athletes in colourful closing
